Jwira-Pepesa, nke a makwaara n'aha dị ka Gwira na Pepesa-Jwira, bụ asụsụ Niger-Congo nke mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ nke Ghana, nke nwere asụsụ Jwira na Pepessa, nke nwere ihe dịka ndị na-asụ puku iri na asatọ  Ọ bụ asụsụ Kwa nke alaka Central Tano, ma soro Nzema nwee nghọta 60% na Ahanta na Anyin nwee nghọta. A na-asụ Jwira n'obodo nta iri na asatọ site na Bamiankaw ruo Humjibere n'akụkụ Osimiri Ankobra, ebe a na-asụrụ Pepesa n'ala Wasa n'etiti Agona Junction na Tarkwa
Ugwu dị iche iche kewara olumba abụọ ahụ.
